title: Excellent care
body: I have had several dealings with the surgery over the previous 2 week, each time I have been treated with respect, dignity and have been fully cared for. A telephone consultation has been followed up with a face to face appointment where required and all calls have been returned when promised. The admin team have also gone over and above to help.

title: Excellent practice
body: Had covid n flu jab recently. Very efficient service. Had a few other health issues where all staff were professional and understanding.

title: Great GP Practice
body:
This is a good GP Practice.
The Clinicians are caring.

Reception staff are helpful and do their best.  Sometimes, as Patients, it can be frustrating when we cannot get what we want when we call in and this frustration can, inadvertently, be taken out on the Reception staff.  They are doing their best considering the huge pressure on NHS and GP services. Kudos to them for trying their best and having to detail with angry and rude patients who sometimes have unreasonable expectations, which I know I have sometimes had.  I have an elderly and sick mother who I care for and sometimes I want things done quickly and immediately  and it can't always be done this way.  There are other patients also who need help.

Thanks to the Practice and its staff for doing their best - and apologies if I have come across as rude sometimes due to pressure from work, home life and becoming a new and unexpected carer for a family member.

title: Great service
body: I visited for my Covid jab recently and was very impressed with how efficient it was.  I also received a 2 page leaflet advising on who does what.  It was extremely informative, and shows how much work goes into offering the services you provide.  Thank you.

title: so caring
body: Such a caring surgery .nothing ever seems to be too much trouble ,and everyone goes well out of their way to be helpful . Had a call from   a doctor yesterday so helpful and kind and did their best to help resolve my problem .Been a patient for many years and the care has always been wonderful. Thankyou all .

title: First class surgery
body:
I am always able to get in to see the doctor if needed, not wait weeks, brilliant surgery,
The receptionists are always very quick to answer your call and excellent dealing with any questions

title: Great practice
body:
I was very happy with my appointment which was by phone. I was promptly by the GP who discussed my concerns and prescribed medication.
The Doctor explained my condition and answered my questions clearly.

title: Fantastic Help
body: I have had to contact the surgery a number of times a d again today to help with changed to my prescription and where I had left tablets at home and I was in a different part of the ukonholiday. On each occasion I ha e rung or gone into the surgery I have been helped and got the prescription I needed the same day. Thank you so much from a very satisfied patient

title: Great Practice
body:
Very friendly and helpful reception staff.
Doctor was very thorough and explained everything very clearly.

title: Brilliant GP practice
body:
This is the best GP surgery Iâ€™ve ever had. Everyone is helpful and friendly, from the reception staff to nurses and doctors. 
Iâ€™ve always been able to get an appointment easily and every consultation Iâ€™ve been listened to and given excellent care including follow up - even with complex issues. 
I feel really lucky to have such a great practice.

title: Flu jab
body: Very swift and friendly professional service by all from reception staff to the medical officer involved with a follow up to be arranged on my asthma

title: A great team.
body: Having spent a total of 14 weeks on Michelham ward this year, I have nothing but praise and a huge thank you for the wonderful care, kindness and professionalism shown to me during the periods I have spent on the ward. A great team who made my stays almost a pleasure.

title: Very good practice
body:
Friendly staff specially on the reception, they try to help you out with queries, appointments ext.
I had a problem with a dvla application, and they took care of it very efficiently and in was completed in very short time. Taking appointments are easy as well alway responsive and very polite over the calls as well.

title: Outstanding reception team!
body:
The reception are absolutely amazing here at The Graham Practise. They are very helpful and understanding towards my elderly aunt and go above and beyond to make sure she is seen to when required.

Itâ€™s very refreshing to come across good competent NHS staff who genuinely care about their job and the service they provide. They are certainly doing a stellar job!!

title: Great team of caring staff
body: I have always had brilliant service from all the staff that I have been in contact with in this surgery. Keep up the great work

title: Wonderful practice
body: Professional and caring treatment with understanding and caring  medical professionals ready to listen and reassure when concerned arose

title: Excellent practice
body: Considering that all GP surgeries are under tremendous pressure, I believe that this practice provides excellent services and care. The admin staff are really friendly. The nurse practitioners and doctors are professional and kind and they go extra mile to help me and my family.

title: Knowledgeable, efficient administration
body: The health service computer system is unable to record my Covid vaccinations delivered outside England. Blocked from obtaining the seasonal jab, I sought advice from The Practice administrator. He investigated the problem without any delay or procrastination and within minutes produced a solution. It is such a rarity in any area these days to find a body who is attentive, knowledgeable, knows where to find the answer and actually puts into it action. He was perfectly clear and succinct in his explanation to me. Very professional. I was impressed.

title: Great surgery
body: Several times wanted to speak to doctor over last few weeks and have always managed to do this.  With only one exception reception answered calls in acceptable time and  were very helpful. Had appointment in the surgery and GP and nursing staff excellent, very caring and looked after very well. Thank you

title: Medical
body: The doctors are understanding, and they seem to care for me, for my health and well-being wellness. The nurses are goo too. Thank goodness for the NHS. Where would we be without them!!!! ðŸ˜€ x

title: Always look after us
body: Surgery always goes extra mile to help us and provide excellent service to patients. Always contact us for reviews and staff have been very helpful as usual. Well managed surgery and great friendly staff

title: Highly Recommend
body: I was referred for laser treatment in both eyes. I was nervous but was put at ease immediately. The whole process was smooth, efficient and professional. Staff were lovely. I have Parkinson's and my Ophthalmologist was very understanding and patient. A very good experience.

title: Dressing by Plastic Surgery Nurses
body: On the 11th October I had my head and leg dressings changed and wounds reviewed by a plastic surgeon. They were very careful in carrying out my treatment which was much appreciated.

readBy.name: University Hospitals of North Midlands NHS Trust

title: Great practice
body: My daughter received therapy for her anxiety and has really helped her. I do feel that she does need more sessions, to help her with her confidence and to help her try to overcome her emotions and feelings.

readBy.name: Kent Community Health NHS Foundation Trust

title: Could not ask for a better surgery
body: I have had to leave a review as I feel people often only do when they have something negative to say. Since joining this surgery and having my baby 6 months ago, I have had to get appointments for myself and baby for various things and I have to say everytime I have done so every doctor has been fantastic with such kind, caring and understanding natures. Even this evening at 6 o'clock I caught the on call doctor who allowed me to bring my baby for a late appointment and gave me the peace of mind that was needed without making me feel like I was wasting his time. Thank you Glenfield Surgery, we are so lucky to have the NHS but all of your GP practitioners are outstanding at their jobs and have been extremely accommodating.

title: Very efficient practice
body: I've never received anything but an efficient service from this practice and feel lucky to be registered with them.

title: Very good practice
body: A very good and helpful service provided. Easy to contact reception, I prefer to do so by phone. Always helpful staff. Appointments can usually be arranged fairly promptly. I have always found all medical staff helpful and supportive. Very good service for COVID and flu vaccinations with reminders and special clinics.

title: Great service
body: Attended a/e following accident at home, seen quickly, appropriate treatment given and sorted in no time. Great service and great staff.

readBy.name: The Dudley Group NHS Foundation Trust

title: First Class
body: From initial appointment to discharge with treatment all completed, everything was excellent!! Thank You

title: Lovely, friendly practice
body: Iâ€™ve had great experiences both in the practice and via the phone. I spoke to a lovely young lady on the phone to discuss a prescription and how to collect and she made it so easy for me, she was extremely helpful and knew exactly what she was doing and made sure everything was clear and easy for both myself and my dad. Thank you to this practice for everything, make sure you continue what youâ€™re doing!

title: Wonderful doctors,nurses and carers, pure angels
body: My husband was dealt with care and professional dedication from all in Accident & Emergency then again when he was taken into Acute Fragile Unit. We are blown away with the way you all looked after him. He felt he was in good hands and cannot thank you enough.

title: Great surgery
body: Always responsive, helpful, accommodating and generally very well run surgery with really excellent staff.

title: Good practice
body: I have always had good service and good doctoring during the many years I have been with Lakeside. I received quick attention recently with onward consultation to hospital. I would highly recommend this practice and rate the receptionists highly as well. Would never consider changing to any other.

title: Simply awesome.
body: I have only been registered with this practice for 4 months. In that time I have been seriously well looked after. Put forward for all well person checks. Promptly obtained appointments. I cannot fault their service, bedside manner and overall professionalism. They all are incredible and do not hesitate recommending this practice for future potential patients. Thanks for everything.

title: Quick service
body: Quick , friendly and efficient GP. Good experience  of having my flue jab done . I have been with this surgery for a long time and would not change to another one .

title: Very good service
body: Went for a flu jab, everything happened on time and with both skill and courtesy. A good experience all round.

title: Fantastic
body: I have had both eyes operated on for caterax within the last 2 months the service is second to none .exceptional friendly helpull surgeons fantastic all staff fantastic would highly recommend.

title: Appointment for flu jab
body:
Receptionist was very polite and confirmed my appointment. 
The nurse giving the flu jab, was professional and explained the procedure clearly. 
I felt comfortable and all went well.

title: I like them. A real angel in incognito is workingâ€¦
body:
This surgery it's not so close to where I'm living. I have to walk 2 km to reach it but I like this place.

They are nice people, caring and helpful (I had a totally different experience in my previous surgery).

The doctor that visited me yesterday, it's probably a real angel working in incognito.

Thanks for existing.

title: Flu Clinic Today
body:
Excellent organization at Surgery, Volunteer's and nurse staff were brilliant despite numbers of people attending and leaving hardly any waiting to be seen at all.
Would recommend the practice

title: Great practice
body: I have been with the practice for many years and wouldnâ€™t leave to go anywhere else. The standards are so high the experience from the reception to the Doctors are so clam and very fast. The Doctors are so understanding and know what to do when you present them with something. Thank you to all the Doctors there Great practice x

title: Excellent service and care.
body: I have recently joined Roby Medical Centre, on the recommendation of a friend.  I am absolutely delighted with the care and attention I have ( quickly ) received. I secured a face to face appointment and long overdue relevant health checks. The  practice can be well recommended. A thank you to all the staff  -they have all been extremely  pleasant and very professional. An efficient and very caring practice.

title: Flu Injection
body: Booked an appointment. Was seen on time. In and out of the practice within 5 minutes. Person giving the injection was friendly.  Couldn't have expected better.

title: Flu jab organisation
body: Very well organised. Better today on 3rd level rather than on ground floor as last year. Plenty of room. No hanging around. Very pleasant staff today. Well done to the surgery for this aspect of seeing patients.

title: Very Helpful and Pleasant Stuff
body: Been a registered Patient for more than many years, I have to say the receptionists GPs Clinical nurses and other stuff are very pleasant,reliable and always happy to help in their best way they can.. can not highly recommend this practice enough,no matter What pressure they are under their care is nothing sort of Excellent... keep Up The Good Work

title: Exemplary Service!
body: From the delightful and courteous lady on Reception in the X-Ray Department through to the professional, reassuring and informative sonographer, the service I received today was first class outstanding! Thank you all.

title: Covid and Flu vaccinations
body: Incredibly organised and lovely staff. I came for my 4th covid vaccination. Front start to finish the organisation was incredible. The staff were all pleasant abundance went out of their way to help. They all work very hard.

title: Great treatment
body:
I cannot thank both the students and consultants enough for the first class treatment I recieved on Thursday 13th October. The students were meticulous in their assessments which was constantly overseen. At no time was I concerned that I was receiving anything but the best of attention
That I was immediately taken for an emergency extraction was a relief. The highly professional way the extraction was carried out I cannot praise enough. At all times great care was taken to reassure me and it was obvious that the students deeply cared about their work. Unfortunately the tooth fairy failed to exchange the tooth for money but times are tight
You have my gratitude

readBy.name: The Newcastle upon Tyne Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust

title: Flu jab
body:
Was seen on time and when I asked the GP was happy to explain what I should do if I had any reaction.
Would have been useful to have the booster at the same time

title: Awful Service
body: On hold for an appointment for 1 hour 40 minutes to be cut off when you get to caller number 12. Called another option in the hope somebody would get the Practice Manager to call me back. A further 15 minutes whilst the lady went to see if this could be arranged to come back with I would receive a call. 2 days later still no call back. Therefore, no appointment to date neither is the Practice Manager is not concerned enough either to call me back is appalling. I totally understand the pressures on the NHS however, the shear frustration of waiting that long when you never go the doctors because of the above then to totally being ignored I find highly unprofessional. I cannot imagine that I am the only patient who has experienced these issues at this Practice either. No staff member seems to be interested or feel that the wait time to just get through is extortionate.

title: Great practice
body: Really friendly receptionists and very punctual and efficient flu surgery. Much better than other Pathfields practices

title: Great practice
body: I visited the surgery today for my Covid booster and flu vaccine. I just want to say a huge thank you to the nurses and other staff for giving up their Saturday to enable working patients like myself to be able to attend outside working hours. It was busy but the staff had it all under control the atmosphere was very friendly but also professional thank you you are a great surgery.

title: Couldn't fault
body: I was well informed during the whole process, the virtual consultation wasn't rushed at all and I got the answers I wanted, couldn't fault the service at all.

title: Poor Customer Service
body:
Hello I am an 84 year old pensioner
I had an appointment for8.30am 12th October and arrived ahead of the time required and waited nearly 2 hours to the be told that I could not be seen today and will have to arrange for another appointment in a months time, no explanation given!
I have been in tears all day about this experience and totally dissatisfied with the lack of due care and respect shown

title: Terrible practice
body: I havenâ€™t seen a doctor in over 2 years ime 75 years of age with copd Iâ€™ve tried to make appointments but by time Iâ€™ve got through all appointments have gone before covid you could get appointments easily so I canâ€™t see why it hasnâ€™t gone back to being able to see a doctor now as covid has gone better the practise is absolutely diabolical you canâ€™t even access patient access correctly I have now given up all hope of ever seeing a doctor again

title: Awful
body:
On hold with 2 callers for over an hour.
Staff are always chatting in the practise while phones are ringing. Awful customer service. Currently taking on more clients while it already takes over an hour on hold to speak to anyone!

title: Help!
body:
I never like to leave negative reviews but I am compelled to do so today.
I work for the NHS so feel your pain and understand how busy we all are. But to enable me to work (full time) I require certain medication. I am absolutely desperate to speak to a GP but it is so difficult - I am always too late for the e-consult as I am so busy at work. I have tried ringing only to be told I am 50 in the queue! I do not have the time to wait, even on my break which is 20 minutes I have no hope of getting through. I feel so let down as I have always only ever had good things to say about the surgery. I am literally at my wits end and worry what will happen if I cannot get through to speak to a doctor.

title: Booking an appointment
body: I have always found it difficult to book appointments, but they are getting more difficult to book. Today I have tried going through the ask my GP site only to find it continually offline, so unable to make contact. The telephone line is continually engaged and if you do get through, they just tell you to book online which you can't do. These people on reception go out of their way to be unhelpful.

title: Avoid
body: Visited on 16th of september and still waiting 4 weeks later for Dr to contact me. Rang 9 times, dr was sent message 1 week ago to contact me urgently and still nothing. Managers advice was to see another Dr but they are busy so no appointments for 2 weeks unless i ring at 8.30. Rang everyday at 8.30 but still no appointment. Mean while i am having seizures and had several falls.

title: Friendly practice
body:
I found the people who were ushering people to guide them to where they needed to be "great practice". Very friendly staff they made you feel welcome.
Even the fact they asked me how I was today, was really comforting.

title: Great process
body: Great process for flu jab. Literally walked in had jab and was walking out after 2 minutes. Set up very well to carry out flu jab, same as last year, well done to all involved.

title: Great care
body: I was seen by a GP and MSK specialist within the same week. Both were very attentive and I felt listened to. They both took their time with me and were very thorough and explained everything very well

title: Well Organised
body: Due to the good organisation & efficiency it was literally a matter of in and out in 2 minutes. Thank you

title: Poor
body:
Waited 50 minutes to even reach a member of staff then palmed off with "a nurse will call you later this afternoon."
So, apparently health checks can be done down a phone, my chest can be listened to, my throat can be viewed etc etc
When asked what if I miss the call, can I get a direct number to reach the nurse I was told I would have to call the same number again. So I guess another 50 minutes waiting?

This problem has been going on for years at Lakeside! The staffing levels must be shocking as you can't get through to speak to anyone for ages and as for actually being able to see a Dr, you're more likely to win the lottery.
Please don't say it's a nationwide problem as my wife is at another surgery and she gets in within 48hrs.

They wonder why so many people go to the 8-8 service or waltz into hospital.

title: Efficient and friendly
body: I was only expecting a flu jab. Was seen on time by a pharmacist. He also took blood pressure (following up on my diagnosis and treatment for Hypertension) and booked a blood test for the following week. He was also able to give me some reassurance and answer questions regarding a minor side effect with one of my medications. All done in 5 mins. Excellent service.

title: Unhelpful
body: I called to get help and the receptionist said they would get back to me soon. Its been 5 weeks i called them back and they told me to call another service that couldnâ€™t help me and cut the call on me when i asked questions and for help.

title: Very friendly and helpful staff.
body: Very friendly and helpful staff. The practice looks very clean and organised. Went for the flu jab and it was a flawless in and out experience.

title: Efficient and Friendly
body: Very impressed with the efficiency of all staff and also super friendly. I was seen very quickly even parking was not an issue

title: Flu Jab
body: My wife and I attended Laira surgery for our annual influenza vaccination. The visit was extremely efficient. No waiting, very quick, very efficient and very polite staff.

title: Flu jab
body: Prompt friendly practice, no waiting around, well organised Saturday Service for flu jab, appointment made online, after invitation text from Surgery, easy to use service.

title: Unsung heroes
body: I just would like to thank all concerned for the excellent volunteers who have endured some abysmal weather ( at times ) to support members of the public who have attended your centre to receive COVID inoculations. They truly deserve to be recognised for their unswerving devotion to the vaccination efforts in this town. 5 stars to you guys

title: Great service today
body: Went to surgery for my flu vaccination after receiving a text message invitation. The organisation today was exceptional, had a short wait which was fine. The staff in the surgery were also exceptional, everyone was very helpful and cheerful, everything was explained to me even though they were very busy. I was also offered a pneumonia vaccination and this was explained and completed for me. The whole process was very quick and efficient, Iâ€™m very grateful thank you very much.

title: Amazing practice!
body: All staff are very friendly and informative, I was kept fully informed and involved in my treatment from start to finish, staff made me feel very looked after and safe. My progression of treatment was very fast and I am so impressed with both the speed and quality of care. I couldnâ€™t recommend this service more!

title: Lovely staff and landscaping
body: East to access, friendly happy staff and lovely surroundings. My favourite location of the Pathfields' Group. Would highly recommend. Many thanks

title: Incredibly rude reception staff
body: I had a very unplesant experiance with the practice. Wanted to order my repeat prescription online only to find out I was no longer a patient at the practice. When I called to question this, I was told a request has been made last year to remove me from the patient list. When I asked which practiceâ€¦ no response.Because I never enrolled elsewhere. No one informed me that I was no longer a patient here even thought they had all my details on record.Iâ€™m in the process of enrolling in the area I live now but the audacity the reception staff has its beyond belief. To add to this unpleasant experience the lady who answered the call decided to end our conversation with â€œoh shut upâ€ and hang up the phone. I was informed by the new practice Iâ€™m the process of enrolling at, that no practice in the uk can take you off their patients list without a request from the new gp. So how did this happen? So without explanation, Iâ€™m currently without a gp for the time being until the paperwork is dealt with at the new practice. Consider changing your admin staff so things like this donâ€™t happen again.

title: Friendly and efficient staff
body: The staff are friendly, professional and very efficient.  I had my flu jab this month and the organisation from turning up at the car park to leaving the surgery was like a well oiled machine with everyone doing their bit efficiently.   Very happy with the experience.

title: Useless
body:
The only way to book a GP appointment is by telephone. And they only accept on the day bookings of which they have very few slots available. After theyâ€™re finished, you can only book emergencies.
Iâ€™ve tried booking a normal GP appointment throughout a couple of weeks for my daughter. Nothing urgent, but couldnâ€™t book one. You either spend hours on the phone to find out there are only emergency bookings left or the robot just tells you to call later because the phone lines are too busy. 
There is no way to book in advance.
Iâ€™m guessing this is the way they make the numbers look good.
They should start taking bookings in advance so the NHS has a figure of how unsuited this surgery is for the number of patients it has under supervision.

title: Disappointing
body: went to Pre op care unit arrived at 11am .Given no up dates from nurses then told at 2:45 my operation has been cancelled .Now i have to go through it all again

title: Would never recommend
body:
On numerous occasions have called for appointments/advice and have been told I would have a call back or was booked in for an appointment. Would never receive a call back and when Iâ€™d call to query there would be no record of my original request. 
Then when an appointment actually does go ahead you have to advocate for yourself far more than a person without a medical agree should ever be expected to. Disgraceful care from start to finish.

title: Good practice
body: This is a good practice and the doctors and nurses are very friendly and provide great health care. Itâ€™s always been easy for me to get a telephone appointment and they answer messages very quickly on the NHS App and Patient Access. However I would say that whenever I have spoken to secretaries that I have found them quite unhelpful and rude at times.

title: Brilliant service
body: I used askmygp at 8.05 on 11th October. I had a reply by 8.30 which asked if l could attend on the 12th at 2.40 for my request for an injection in my right knee to be carried out. Thank you Roxton Practise, l could ask for no more than this.

title: Rubbish
body: For 3 days in a row I have phoned up at 8.30 and been on hold for 1 hour each time to be told there are no appointments available, I give up all that is required is a quick phone call with a doctor to increase dose of blood pressure.

title: Not Useful - Waste of Time
body: Moved away to uni and waiting for my Gp registration to come through. Couldnâ€™t get a Gp appointment so consulted online who told me to call 111 who told me to make a Gp appointment or go to the walk in centre. As Iâ€™d already tried and failed to get a Gp appointment I went to the walk in centre. Very unclear where it actually was. Poor signage. At the centre I saw a nurse practitioner who told me to make a Gp appointment, call 111 or go to Accident & Emergency . I had already tried to get a Gp appointment and 111 had told me to come to the walk-in centre.I knew that although I was in a lot of pain that it wasnâ€™t the right thing for me to go to Accident & Emergency - nurse practitioner also told me that the wait would be over 12 hours. Completely pointless to go there. No one there could do anything for me - no prescribing doctor on site.

title: Excellent  service
body: I got a telephone appointment with the doctor on the "same day^and from this I had a blood and urine test with the Nelson Hospital immediately. Once the results were known I again phoned and made a face to face appointment.and again was given one the next day. Excellent service from reception/Hospital/Doctors.

title: No  Clinics
body:
I had Urology  surgery in  May and  then  in June,  as the  first surgery  had become  infected. 
On both occasions  I was  promised a  follow up in 6 weeks. 
It is  now  October and  still  no  follow up  Appointment,  despite  repeated  requests.

title: No appointment system reminders
body:
Why can't the surgery implement a reminder system. I just missed an appt that I waited for 12 wks  and had the date given me 4 wjs ago, but am now told I have been told that I'm back on the wait list. 
People live busy lives and these surgeries are now all merged together in the interest of efficiency. Why not put in a straight forward appt system, my dentist, hairdresser, and many other orgs provide reminders. This would ensure real efficiency, and the gp time saved time and I really needed to get to that appt too. Don't punish us for your inadequate systems! I now have another min 12 wk wait. Its quite upsetting.

title: Poor communication
body:
I was granted a â€œtelephone consultationâ€ with a doctor and waited over a week.
I then received a text stating my appointment would be for 10:30am. Closer to the time I received a second message confirming it and again 10:30am. I went to the gym and found I had a missed call from the doctors at 9:30am, I then had a message stating the doctor had rang twiceâ€¦â€¦ not true I only had one missed call. I contacted the surgery and was told by the receptionist that a telephone call could be made anytime!!!!!!! So whatâ€™s the point of an appointment time????????? To add insult to injury I have Now received a message advising me Iâ€™ve missed an appointment!
Not impressed Iâ€™m thinking of moving practice.

title: reception  is bad
body: I need to collect form for test and container from reception , but they given me not right container and I need to come couple times to sort this, when they giving me not right container, I telling ,that not right but they don't take notice ,when I ask for somebody who can realy know ,they saying that it's right and i can't to see anybody.

title: Horrible service
body: I had a surgery a week ago and itâ€™s impossible of me to get hold of my GP for post surgery care. Appointments are long to wait for even for such conditions more than 10 days of wait !

title: Awful
body: I've had a repeat prescription for 4 years now and this practice has never got it right. I've had to go down in person, mere days post operation to beg for the right thing to be sent to the right pharmacy. I've spoken to the manager, I've tried to talk to reception, I've even broken down on a doctor. So far the advice has been "go elsewhere". Absolutely shocking place.

title: Great practice
body: Very efficient and quick service provided. .very  Polite staff  covid precautions were in place. Ample parking.

title: Incredible caring Team
body:
My Uncle suffering from Dementia was taken by Social Services to a place a safety - the care shown to him by all staff at Barton Lodge was outstanding.  We also quietly observed the patience and care shown towards other residents - always kindly, always patient - it was quite moving actually. 
The management kept us informed and updated throughout my Uncles lengthy stay, we were impressed by the friendly yet professional approach and constant care in difficult circumstances - my Uncle left the Barton Lodge care home in a much better state of mind and more able to cope with daily life.
The home itself is in a marvellous position - with views of The Needles Isle of Wight from the extensive gardens, the accommodation is modern and comfortable, rooms personalised, and the food is very good. We couldnâ€™t have asked for more - our sincere thanks to all.

title: Quick, quick easy & welcoming
body: Popped in for my flu jab; welcomed & directed from the car park onwardsâ€¦despite being early I was in & out within 3 mins.  Very efficient & easy.

title: Brilliant service
body:
I visited the surgery today for my annual flu jab. The whole process was quick and efficient. Start to finish less than 4 minutes. 
Thank you for making the visit so easy

title: Fantastic practice
body: In and out time for flu jab time was very quick, staff very polite and helpful ,practice was very clean and well organised, many thanks

title: Day Surgery wonderful experience
body: I had a procedure that required a short stay and sedation in the day surgery unit. The doctor and nurses were so professional and polite and put me at ease as soon as I arrived. I couldnâ€™t have asked for more, thank you.

readBy.name: East Kent Hospitals University NHS Foundation Trust

title: "Very professional "
body: Lovely staff, I didn't have to wait past my appointment time, I would highly recommend. They explained everything that was going to happen and answered all my questions which was reassuring. I would like to say a big thank you.

title: Flu vaccination procedure
body: Many thanks to all the doctors and staff for organising and running a very efficient and speedy process this morning. A pleasure to attend the clinic.

title: The best GP practice I could ever imagine.
body: Constantly shouting about Burngreave Surgery and try and give compliments to staff as often as I can. Iâ€™ve never had an issue getting an appointment, staff are all so friendly and they work efficiently. I feel so lucky to be part of this surgery.

title: Never had a problem
body:
I've been using this practice for many years. Reception staff have always been polite and helpful, I'm sure they respond to being spoken to in a courteous manner. 
The doctors have always been top class.
